job.title: Junior Data Scientist
job.description:
Job Description
The Global Servicing Network (GSN) organization delivers extraordinary customer care to Card Members, merchants, and commercial clients around the world, while providing world-class credit, collections and fraud services.
The Big Data and Advanced Analytics team provided models to enhance and compliment the existing processes accross the organization.
Purpose Of The Role
Regularly engage with business teams to understand their needs and requirements and operationalize a framework for deploying Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing models
Prototype and deploy use cases for Machine learning in the global Servicing Network (GSN) operating environment and ability to operationalize into workable algorithms & solutions.
The role is expected to provide strategic guidance using Machine Learning and NLP across multiple operating areas within our GSN including structed and unstructured text mining to help business requirements.
It is also expected that role brings to the table expertise in Machine Learning and how best advanced concepts can be applied into GSN operating areas
Responsibilites
Conceptualize, test and prototype beta versions of algorithms independently and working along with business counterparts in larger GSN organization
Rigorous testing of algorithms as per business norms and delivering significant working leverage over status quo and generate value for the business be on top of trends
Critical Factors To Success
Able to explain technical terms to non-technical people
Provide the business with the models that they need in a timely manner
Bring innovation in Machine Learning technqiues to optimally deploy the ML architecture
Drive structural improvement projects via Machine Learning and achieve the efficiency goals
Business Outcomes
Bring innovation in Machine Learning technqiues to optimally deploy the ML architecture
Drive structural improvement projects via Machine Learning and achieve the efficiency goals
Leadership Outcomes
Put enterprise thinking first and always balance stakeholder agendas
Continuously engage with the external Data Science world to track the new advancements
Academic Background And Experience
Bachelor's or Master's degree surroudning Data Science or relevant field OR 3+ years of applicable work experience
Able to use both Deep learning and ML libaries
Work in the financial space is a plus but not required
Functional Skills/Capabilities
Deep curiosity and questioning skills
Ability to create innovative data solutions
Knowledge of ML in areas like Fraud and Disputes modeling in a plus
Technical Skills/Capabilities
Complete grip on Python environment and libraries (scikit, nltk, pandas and numpy).
Working knowledge of PySpark is a plus.
Knowledge of the Hadoop Infrastructure and how it works
Both Deep learning (keras/TF) and ML (scikit/xgboost) is required
Knowledge Of Platforms
Platforms primarily Python/HDFS
Behavioral Skills/Capabilities
American Express Leadership Behaviors
Set The Agenda: Define What Winning Looks Like, Put Enterprise Thinking First, Lead with an External Perspective
Bring Others With You: Build the Best Team, Seek & Provide Coaching Feedback, Make Collaboration Essential
Do It The Right Way: Communicate Frequently, Candidly & Clearly, Make Decisions Quickly & Effectively
American Express is an equal opportunity employer and makes employment decisions without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability status, age, or any other status protected by law.
Employment eligibility to work with American Express in the U.S. is required as the company will not pursue visa sponsorship for these positions.
